entry.title: Newsletter #114
entry.content:
Hi Everyone!

The last weekeed the tech team had a fun couple of hours playing paintball! Some scratches here and there but it was definitely worth it! :)

This week we have some of our team mates (Alex, Oba and Cirpo ) going to the DockerCon Europe 2015 in Barcelona!! If you are there and wanna have a chat with them, just go and say “hi!”.

And now: enjoy the links!

  • 10 best practices for better restful api | thinking mobile

  • a 360 degree view of the entire netflix stack

  • a first look at rds aurora

  • a message for bosses and people who have them

  • an intro to functional programming concepts in javascript — medium

  • docker clustering tools compared: kubernetes vs docker swarm | technology conversations

  • does tdd really lead to good design?

  • don’t try to be a jack of all trades, but try to avoid becoming type-cast

  • Docker compose UI

  • how to recover from the integrated tests scam

  • how understanding databases improves your developer skills – code school blog

  • how we explain equity

  • how we unit test react components using expect-jsx | milliseconds matter

  • i’m an impostor
